title: Person In Steamy Room Medium Skin Tone
description: A person, typically depicted as a person, enjoying a steam room or sauna. It conveys relaxation, pampering, and self-care.
apple_vendor_description: The person in a steamy room emoji on Apple devices depicts an individual with a medium skin tone, enveloped in a cloud of ethereal steam, suggesting a relaxing and rejuvenating experience. Apple‚Äôs design language brings this to life with subtle, translucent gradients in the steam and a serene facial expression, accented by soft rounded edges on the figure. This emoji is commonly used to convey a sense of relaxation, spa treatments, or unwinding after a long day.
